description: A cunning tactic where explosives are placed inside rum barrels to injure enemies when they drink. This was used to sabotage Dorry and frame the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 successfully uses this tactic to severely injure Dorry by placing explosives in rum barrels.
keyMoments.effectiveness: Successfully incapacitated one of the island's most powerful warriors
